author: evenisse
msg: Add maven-jdiff-plugin:report, maven-jdiff-plugin:register and maven-jdiff-plugin:deregister goals for add jdiff report in site generation.

author: vmassol
msg: Added xml jelly tag dependeny as it seems to be required by maven rc3 (but not by Maven 1.0 head).

author: brett
msg: * fold deploy plugin into artifact plugin - make it easier to manage migration
* add legacy property to force use of deploy plugin via artifact tags
* use deploy plugin if artifact is not configured
* clean up exception handling in artifact
* utilise deploy properties in artifact plugin if it is not configured
